alert.note: Alert for Bayfield; Douglas (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 03 at 2:19AM CDT by NWS Duluth
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Bayfield, southeastern Douglas, northern Washburn and northwestern Sawyer Counties through 245 AM CDT... At 218 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Minong, or 18 miles west of Hayward, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow unsecured objects around. Locations impacted include... Hayward, Round Lake, Cable, Wascott, Minong, Seeley, Spider Lake, Totagatic Flowage, Minong Flowage, Stanberry, Totagatic Lake, and Nelson Lake. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: Anyone outdoors, including anyone on or in the water, should seek shelter inside a sturdy building or hard topped vehicle.
